sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"垂直的，竖式的"之意。
means: vertical ： 指与平面、水平线或基线成直角或几乎成直角向上延伸至顶点的物体。也可指呈直线上升或下降的。
perpendicular ： 指与水平线形成90度的线或面，或朝垂直方面延伸的，尤指向下的急剧运动。
upright ： 普通用词，指竖立、笔直而不是倾斜、倒塌的。
erect ： 指笔直挺拔，而非倾斜、佝偻、弯曲或倒塌的。
plumb ： 建筑上用词，凭锤球评判某物是否完全垂直。

sentence.Network_en: He was sitting on an upright chair beside his bed, reading.
sentence.Network_cn: 他正坐在床前一张直背椅上看书。

sentence.Network_en: He was handsome, upright and chivalrous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他长相英俊，为人正直，风度翩翩。

sentence.Network_en: Cautiously, he moved himself into an upright position.
sentence.Network_cn: 他小心翼翼地直起了身子。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English upriht, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch oprecht and German aufrecht (see up, right)

entry.tran: 垂直的；挺直的；直挺挺的
entry.def: If you are sitting or standing upright, you are sitting or standing with your back straight, rather than bending or lying down.

example.ex: Helen sat upright in her chair...
example.tran: 海伦笔直地坐在椅子上。

example.ex: ...those who had managed to remain upright...
example.tran: 那些尽力保持腰背挺直的人

entry.tran: （吸尘器、冰箱等）竖式的，立式的
entry.def: An upright vacuum cleaner or freezer is tall rather than wide.

example.tran: 最新款、最先进的立式吸尘器

entry.def: An upright chair has a straight back and no arms.

example.ex: He was sitting on an upright chair beside his bed, reading.
example.tran: 他正坐在床前一张直背椅上看书。

entry.def: You can refer to vertical posts or the vertical parts of an object as uprights .
You can describe people as upright when they are careful to follow acceptable rules of behaviour and behave in a moral way.

example.tran: 一个非常正直可靠的人

means.word_mean: 1. a vertical structural member as a post or stake;
2. a piano with a vertical sounding board
1. in a vertical position; not sloping;

sentences.sentence: "the life of the nation is secure only while the nation is honest, truthful, and virtuous"- Frederick Douglass
"behind him sat old man Arthur; he was straight with something angry in his attitude"
"for a dog, an erect tail indicates aggression"
"a column still vertical amid the ruins"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚硬的, 刚性的, 严格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rig正,直+id如……的→直的→刚硬的, 刚性的→严格的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正义[的,地], 公正[的,地], 正确[的,地]
stems_affixes.word_buile: rig正,直+ht→adj.&adv.&n.正义[的,地], 公正[的,地], 正确[的,地]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 垂直的, 竖式的, 正直的
stems_affixes.word_buile: up向上+right[adj.&adv.&n.正义[的,地], 公正[的,地], 正确[的,地]]→adj.&adv.&n.垂直的, 竖式的, 正直的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 端正地, 正当地, 正确地
stems_affixes.word_buile: right[adj.&adv.&n.正义[的,地], 公正[的,地], 正确[的,地]]+ly表副词→adv. 端正地, 正当地, 正确地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严格, 严厉, 苛刻, 严密, 严酷, 精确
stems_affixes.word_buile: rig正,直+or表名词→严格, 严厉
